name: Scientific
victoryScreenHeader: Build the Hades Project and all core miner parts to win!
milestones: Add all [core miner parts] in capital
victoryString: You have achieved victory through mastery of science! Your technical prowess has allowed you to tap into the lowest depths of Io's core and send its wealth back to Earth at faster-than-light speeds. Profits shall come into your company as never before!
defeatString: You have been defeated. Your competitors have overwhelmed you and seized the wealth of Io. But don't fret. There are other moons and planets out there, ready to be mined and developed. You may yet strike it rich!

name: Domination

name: Diplomatic

Your statesmanship will stand as an example to all other companies for generations!
